title: Inquire About a Life Insurance Claim Denial
description: A beneficiary is calling because their life insurance claim was denied, and they want to understand why.

tasks.description: Identify the caller and locate the denied claim file.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the claim file associated with the caller.

tasks.description: Review the claim notes to find the specific reason for denial.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the claim was denied due to a material misrepresentation on the original application (undeclared health condition).

tasks.description: Clearly and empathetically explain the reason for the denial and outline the process for an appeal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent communicates the difficult information clearly and provides instructions on how to appeal the decision.
